text: yud'dhattil ninnu vittuninna gramina arabikaleat parayuka: "kathinamaya akramana sesiyulla janatte neritan ninnalkk ahvanam labhikkum. avar kilatannum vare ninnalavareat pearutentivarum. a ahvanam ninnal anusariccal allahu ninnalkk atimahattaya pratiphalam nalkum. athava neratte ninnal pintirinnapeale pinmarunnapaksam ninnale avan siksikkum. neaverum siksa
